text.title: Best Pizza in Tokyo: 2 Restaurants That Might Surprise You!
text.p: Japan is not normally where you think of
to get a good slice of pizza but
recently Tokyo has been leaving its mark
on global Pizza rankings and people have
been raving about it on social media so
today I thought I'd go check out a
couple of really great pizza restaurants
in Tokyo that are much loved and
respected in the pizza Community both
here and abroad let's go check it
[Music]
out Ste
today I am in azabujuban which is one of
the most upscale areas of Tokyo with a
very strong International presence and
that's probably why it is home to so
many of the best pizza spots in Tokyo
before we go check out our first one
don't forget to subscribe for more Japan
Adventures like this one and all the
best eats in Japan let's go have some
pizza here we are now at Pizza Strada it
recently ranked 14th in Asia in the 50
top Pizza ranking clearly they've won a
lot of awards and it's very popular here
so let's go inside and see what they
got wow best view of the fire oven oh my
goodness
for for
this looks and smells incredible you can
smell the smokiness from the little
crispy bits from the Woodfired oven and
I was really impressed that we could
watch the entire making of the pizza
right in front of you from the dough
rolling out and it looks incredible I
cannot wait to dig in a classic pizza
margarita oh my gosh this looks so good
it's still piping hot straight out of
the oven
which I really think is the way that you
should be eating
pizza pizza in

good M and I can't stop eating it this

M that is very good extremely flavorful
it's so cheesy you get this crunch of

it's a wonderful combination I really
enjoy the creativity in this pizza
[Music]
well that was an absolutely wonderful
pizza shop I will definitely be back
here but I do have another really great
pizza restaurant to show you guys today
that's also in the aabu area so let's
head over there and try some more
pizzas I am now here in the aabu D area
which is ajacent to asaba juuba and
where I was earlier and this area is now
home to Japan's tallest building behind
me here as it's a newly revamped area
called azabudai Hills which is a
skyscraper complex and this area is
where my next pizza restaurant is going
to be so let's go take a walk around and
find the shop established here since
2011 long before the aab hills complex
opened is Pizzeria Pepe napi STA and
this is a restaurant that is ranked
within the Asia's 50 best pizza list
this year and last year it was even
within the world's 50 best pizza list so
it is a very wellestablished and clearly
a very good pizza restaurant that was
actually owned and is still run by a
Naples born Italian chef so let's go
inside and see what the pizza is all
about wow this lovely the atmosphere is
very Italian I mean it you should go
without seeing but it really feels like
I've stepped into Italy so the staple
Pizza to try here is called the Don
Salvo what's really interesting about it
is it is in a star shape and the crust
is actually filled with ricotta cheese
and salami and I think that sounds
incredible another one that they
recommended for today was the bismar
pizza it says they've got a be Italiana
so why not lastly there's one thing that
really struck my fancy on this menu they
have canoli I haven't had canoli since I
lived in Canada when I was a high school
student and I worked in an Italian
bakery so I used to eat the canoli there
all the time and I have not seen it in
Japan it's very rare let's do it it's
going to be a Taste of Italy today this
beer is really interesting I've just
discovered that was created specifically
to go with the neapolitan pizza so
apparently the flavors are meant to
match really well and the name and the
logo comes from the pul chinel which is
apparently the symbol of Naples in the
world I didn't know this and Hell means
light beer in German apparently so
that's where the naming comes from and
I've never tried this before so I cannot
wait all right let's give it a taste
come by or since we're in Italian
restaurant
salute there are so many Italians
working here but people who walk in are
Italian that's definitely a really good
sign that the pizza's going to be good
and the beer is excellent fruity light
and very
refreshing this looks incredible with
the bis Mar Pizza you can see how much
truffle is over top love truffle cannot
wait to give it a try honestly the
atmosphere here is so much
fun it's very Lively let's give it a
taste

[Music]
this is definitely leagues above

go right
